title: What is halal usury and what are the types of usury?

preview.html: What is permissible usury and what are its types? Usury is one of the forbidden things mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, and it is forbidden by explicit text. Banks, companies and individuals bypass usury to make profits and money illegally. In this article, we will learn together about the answer to the question about what usury is and what are the types of usury. Types of usury There are different types of usury, and as we mentioned, usury in the legal sense is an additional fee, especially for one of the contracting parties, and it must be free of charge. There are two types of usury: Usury on debts: This type of usury is forbidden by the Qur’an, and this means that debts exceed debts in exchange for increased possessions. It is one of the most common types of loan loans, and it is also the most heinous. Selling usury: This type of usury is done by selling surplus money, that is, usurious money to each other, and this usurious money is mostly in different forms such as (land, gold, dates, salt, silver, Barley or otherwise) and usury is usually there. Two types of sales: The first type: usury of interest: that is, delaying the receipt of one of these two things in selling the usurious surplus. In this case, the usury is sold for something other than its money, such as: selling all the money in exchange for it. gold. Or silver, or any other type, as it is likely to be permissible, and it is a compromise solution, that is, it is practical to decrease or increase, mainly due to the difference in gender, and in most cases this is not permissible. One of the substitutions is delayed over the other, and in this case the exchange must take place in a meeting. The second type is riba al-fadl: riba al-fadl, i.e. the increase in one of these two estimates. Selling usurious money for other usurious money of the same type, such as selling gold for gold; Because in this case it is not permissible to sell gold except by using an equivalent amount of gold, and in the case of an increase in gold. On both sides, this sale will turn into a usurious sale. Reasons for prohibiting usuryUsury: Whoever takes money from another in return, that is, returns excess money to him, in this case, usury is forbidden according to Islamic law. Usury, in turn, leads to disturbances in relations and acquaintances between people, such as the use of loans or And other methods. Usury, as we mentioned, is proven by the text of its prohibition, and therefore it is necessary to firmly affirm the prohibition of usury. God Almighty has forbidden usury for all people so that they do not practice forbidden gains. Sometimes the person who lends to him is rich and sometimes the borrower is poor, then he The rich empower the poor and then ask them to repay the money he lent to get more. This is called usury. Usury also works to distribute the incomes of individuals. Usury leads to the accumulation of money in the hands of a certain category of money owners. Usury disrupts trade, profits, and business. Usury is forbidden in all heavenly religions. Judaism, Christianity and Islam forbid it. This was mentioned in the Holy Book (Old Testament), which forbade usury. It was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in Surat Al-Baqarah with the number of the earth: (Those who consume usury will only be raised in excess. Sleeping gown in a girl’s dream The unmarried woman is a praiseworthy symbol in visions. If a girl sees that she is buying it or trying it on, or sees someone giving her a nightgown, this portends many things. Or work and society. Whoever sees that he gave her a nightgown is a man who will get married soon. The blue shirt indicates success and excellence, whether in earnings or in studies. The red or pink nightgown indicates a strong emotional state. The white nightgown shows friendliness, purity, and purity of heart and soul. A silk nightgown is better than a nightgown made of cloth. Or linen. Sometimes, a beautiful nightgown indicates marriage. A long nightgown is better than a short one in visions. It is not good for visions to wear a transparent or open nightgown. It is also unfortunate for the shirt to be torn or burned, and it is unfortunate for it to be lost or neglected and thrown away. The best thing is that Seeing a girl as if she is walking around in her nightgown is an expression of marriage, engagement, or something like that. It is also praised in visions for an unmarried girl to see as if she is receiving a guest in her nightgown, provided that it is not transparent or short. Because a short shirt indicates negligence in worship. A black nightgown is a praiseworthy vision in a married woman’s dream, because it reflects the strong relationship and relationship between the spouses. The best vision is to see the husband buying a black nightgown for his wife and giving it to her. And whoever gives her the nightgown in his sleep will hear good news that makes her happy. title: Interpretation of a dream about empty pens and papers

preview.html: A pen in a dream indicates knowledge, assumptions, prohibitions, and rulings. Whoever sees that he has a pen or paper in his hand, then he is safe from need for the rest of his life. A pen in a dream possesses something valuable or something of value. He also said: The pen was born. Whoever sees that he has taken a pen, he will gain knowledge or wisdom, and if he writes with it, this pen will be in the meaning of the expressions written with it. And the pen of leadership, guardianship, and the infallibility of evil. Whoever sees a pen in his hand and another pen next to him, he will have a brother who will cast him, even if his wife is pregnant and has given birth to a son. The pen in the vision guarantees whoever sees it. Whoever sees in the hand of a pen that he has taken it from a ruler or king, he will be struck with awe and awe.And the ink pen was born a male. The pen is declared an oath by which the one who sees it in his hand swears by it, according to the Almighty’s words: (N, by the pen and what they write). If a man sees that his pen is lost or broken, then its interpretation is in his life and career. Perhaps the pen is for the man and the paper is for the woman. The pen in a dream also shows giving and generosity or being victorious over enemies. Seeing the ruler’s pen in a dream indicates an oath. Perhaps his vision suggests knowledge, memorization, and skilled craftsmanship, and perhaps it suggests longevity and living. Interpretation of the pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The pen in a dream shows what a person is reminded of and the principles are applied accordingly, such as the ruler, knowledge, judge, tongue, weapon, and male child. Perhaps it indicates the male, and the ink is his offspring, and what is written on it indicates the purity of the woman. Perhaps it indicates marriage, the fingers are his children, and the ink is his offspring. It was said that the pen shows knowledge. Whoever dreams that he took a pen, he will acquire knowledge that matches what he saw in his dream that he was writing with. It was said that it is the beginning of a guarantee and a promise in the Almighty’s saying: “And you were not with them when they threw away their pens, for among them were those who would guarantee Mary.” On the authority of a people who said to Ibn Shirin: I saw that I was bending down with a pen next to me, so I took it and began to write with it, and I found another pen on my right, so I took it and wrote it all down. He said: Are you absent? He said yes. He said: It is as if I kissed you. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of writing in a dream. If a writer dreams that he has a pen or an inkwell in his hand, then he is safe from the lack of his profession. If he sees that he has exhausted all the tools of writing, he will have complete command in writing that will surpass his peers. Likewise, whoever sees that he has exhausted one of the tools of his art is safe from deprivation. If he sees that he has done a complete job, he will assume the presidency of the university. The scraper with which the pen is cut indicates that the fortuneteller is jealous or hateful. It was said: Whoever sees an iron pen in his hand goes to a woman who was with him before. Because he says: Say: Become stones or iron or what grows in your breasts, and they say: Who will bring us back? And the pen in interpretation is the commandment, prohibition, and guardianship in every art, and the pen respects everything in visions, and nothing compares to it in interpretation except the key. And he saw a human being in his sleep. It is as if he took a pen, and linked his dream into a passage, and it was said to him: A son will be born to you who will learn good knowledge. As for a pen or inkwell, in a dream it represents service and benefit from women, and a blessing from offspring. Likewise, whoever sees that he has exhausted one of the tools of his art is safe from deprivation. If he sees that he has done a complete job, he will assume the presidency of the university. The scraper with which the pen is cut indicates that the fortuneteller is jealous or hateful. It was said: Whoever sees an iron pen in his hand goes to a woman who was with him before. Because he says: Say: Become stones or iron or what grows in your breasts, and they say: Who will bring us back? And the pen in interpretation is the commandment, prohibition, and guardianship in every art, and the pen respects everything in visions, and nothing compares to it in interpretation except the key. And he saw a human being in his sleep. It is as if he took a pen, and linked his dream into a passage, and it was said to him: A son will be born to you who will learn good knowledge. As for a pen or inkwell, in a dream it represents service and benefit from women, and a blessing from offspring.
